text: (Waya kuYûsuf wathi): “Hini na Yûsuf ndoda yenyaniso! Khawusichazele (intsingiselo yephupha) leemazi zenkomo ezisixhenxe, ezityebileyo eziye zadliwa zezinye ezisixhenxe, ezinqinileyo, nezikhwebu zombona ezisixhenxe eziluhlaza, nezinye ezisixhenxe ezomileyo, kho’ukuze ndibuyele ebantwini babe nokwazi.”
